They Came Waddling

July 2014

PASSAGE 2014 International Street Theater Festival, Helsingør/Helsingborg

Figura Ensemble, An outdoor march orchestra street performance

Director: Morten K. Roesen

Actor: Maja Clementsen Hansen / Costumes design: Filippa Berglund / Dancer: Edith Buttingsrud Pedersen

Singers: Jakob Bloch Jespersen og Nana Bugge Rasmussen

Photographer: Pelle Rink
